technology: 1, There were no technical difficulties experienced by the participant.

questions: What's your first reaction when you heard about COVID-19 and how did it affect your work style and how do you adapt your work style according to it? (00:24:05)
What's your experience regarding the vaccination? Did you take the vaccination? If yes, what are the side effects and what's your perception after you took the vaccine? (00:28:10)
What's your first thing that came to your mind when you heard about the booster doses? (00:36:47)

booster_importance: 7, The participant believes that boosters are extremely important.

general_notes: The participant was very engaged in the conversation and shared his experiences and asked questions of his partner. He was also very respectful and polite.
